snippet.title: CANNONPISTOL | Official  Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the official  game reveal from smokeback studio .Forge your own path in a Boss rush hunting run and boom adventure as the last Goldchest hunter! Explore , build, battle in shineless lands and skies to reclaim what was lost till the last Goldchest beast falls! 

Odspiken has been shattered into shineless world of darkness...Once thrived in harmony, as a glittering golden paradise with shiny skies…until the beasts descended from the sky like storms, devouring night and day, draining the lands of all its shine one by one, we fell to their gold driven hunger of the Goldchest beasts!

Time tested and reshaped us to fight back until only one Hunter remained. In our darkest hour, hope ignited with the last sacred ore left we forged a weapon that became our symbol to reclaim what was lost, the first Cannon Pistol. 

#cannonpistolgame
